trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_SEQ_00<tab>Swift believes you should get yourself a chocobo.

TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_SEQ_01<tab>To obtain your personal chocobo, you must present Mimigun with a Flame Chocobo Issuance. This document can be obtained by exchanging company seals with the flame quartermaster. Here's hoping you have been setting aside your seals...
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_SEQ_02<tab>Mimigun brings you your bird, and it is love at first sight. Name your new companion, and make it official.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_SEQ_03<tab>After much deliberation, you decide on a name worthy of the noblest steed. Inform Mimigun to complete the last of the formalities.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_SEQ_04<tab>And so begins the adventures of <var 29 EB02 /var> and <var 29 EB38 /var>. May their friendship last for eternity!
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_TODO_00<tab>Present a Flame Chocobo Issuance to Mimigun.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_TODO_01<tab>Name your chocobo.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Mimigun.

TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_Swift_000<tab><var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, yes? A moment of your time, if you please.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_Swift_001<tab>You wish to carry out your duties swiftly, do you not? Well then, perhaps you should get yourself a chocobo.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_Swift_002<tab>If you're interested, the Immortal Flames will furnish you with one. It's not a complex process, but it does require some paperwork.

TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_Swift_003<tab>First, speak with the quartermaster to obtain a Flame Chocobo Issuance. You'll need to exchange company seals in order to do so. Once you've received your issuance, show it to Mimigun by the Gate of Nald. He'll be the one to furnish you with a bird.

TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_Swift_010<tab>If you wish to acquire your own personal chocobo, you'll need to get a Flame Chocobo Issuance from the quartermaster. Show the deed to Mimigun at the stables, and he'll furnish you with your own bird.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_000<tab>Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Flame Chocobo Issuance.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_010<tab>Yes, everything appears to be in order.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_011<tab>A moment please. I'll be right back with your chocobo.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_012<tab>And here he is! The fellow has been in high spirits the past few bells. He must have sensed that his master was coming!
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_013<tab>Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_020<tab>Want a bird issued, you say? Then I'll need to see your Flame Chocobo Issuance. You can get one from the Flame quartermaster, over at the Hall of Flames.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_021<tab>Of course, you will need to exchange Flame Seals for it. You can earn these by completing tasks for the Immortal Flames, Ul'dah's Grand Company.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_CHOCOBO_000<tab>Kweh!
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_030<tab>Now then, to make it official, you'll want to give your noble steed a name.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_040<tab>Heh heh! I daresay he likes his name!
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_041<tab>Here is your very own chocobo whistle. Simply blow into it, and your feathered friend will come bounding to your side.

TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_042<tab>But do forgive him if he doesn't respond when summoned in crowded city areas or monster-infested lairs. Chocobos are stout-hearted creatures, but they have their limits.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_043<tab>And lastly, I present you with your chocobo rider's license, as is required by law.
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_MIMIGUN_044<tab>And that concludes all the formalities! I wish you and your chocobo long years of fulfilling companionship!
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_TITLE<tab>Name Your Chocobo
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_CAPTION<tab>Name
TEXT_SUBWIL160_00702_CHOCOBO_PROMPT_MES0<tab>Names must be between 2 and 20 alphabetic characters.
